weightedinventory.configuration.allowArm: Allow locking of the armor slots
weightedinventory.configuration.allowOff: Allow locking of the offhand slot
weightedinventory.configuration.defaultS: The amount of slots given by armor that has not been setup with a slot count
weightedinventory.configuration.defaultU: The amount of unlocked slots given to players by default
weightedinventory.configuration.disableI: Disable weighted inventory in creative mode
